comments.body:
this doesn't work if i try to call lineNumber from Dotty:
```scala
// macros2.scala
object Macro1Consume {
  val test = Macro1.lineNumber
}
```

```scala
-- Error: macros2.scala:4:13 -------------------------------------
4 |  val test = Macro1.lineNumber
  |             ^
  |       cannot merge
  |         method lineNumber in object Macro1 of type => Int  and
  |         method lineNumber in object Macro1 of type => Int
  |       they are both defined in object Macro1 but have matching signatures
  |         => Int and
  |         => Int
  |       as members of object Macro1
  |              
1 warning found
1 error found
```
It is already fixed. Probably by 71a20e4d32598478aaa5b338af6d4838c99d8bc8.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1,5 @@

object Macro1 {
  import scala.language.experimental.macros
  def lineNumber: Int = macro LineNumberMacro2.thisLineNumberImpl
